directions: Combine tomatoes and cucumbers in a bowl. Add sour cream, balsamic vinaigrette, lemon juice, dill, and garlic salt; stir. Season with salt and ground pepper.
ingredients: 1/4 cup sour cream, or to taste
2 1/2 teaspoons balsamic vinaigrette dressing (such as Wish-Bone®)
4 pinches garlic salt with parsley (such as Lawry's®)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Creamy Cucumber Tomato Salad
